description: The Prairifire Flowering Crab (Malus 'Prairifire') is an amazing species of flowering crabapple. Its stunning bright pink flowers and deep red summer foliage makes for an eye-catching display. It has incredible disease resistance and is drought tolerant, making it perfect for gardens in a range of climates and settings. Prairifire Flowering Crab is very low-maintenance and blooms profusely in the spring, and with its relatively small stature it can fit into almost any garden. This small flowering tree is hardy and will bring wildlife into your garden with its colourful fruit in the late summer.
